tns:patch.author: jdeanquin
tns:patch.description: Hide Word Export in Activity Preview for not logged in users true false

script.lang: INSERT INTO amp_global_settings (id, settingsname, settingsvalue, possiblevalues, description, section) VALUES (nextval('amp_global_settings_seq'), 'Hide word export public view', 'false', 't_Boolean', 'Hide Word Export in Activity Preview for not logged in users', 'general');
